sentence: Pennsylvania state Sen. Doug Mastriano won the GOP gubernatorial primary after pushing unsubstantiated claims of widespread voter fraud in the 2020 election.
author: Sarakshi Rai
title: Kinzinger says Cawthorn loss good for the country

sentence: Trump boasted another win with the victory of state Sen. Doug Mastriano, an additional endorsement that roiled some Pennsylvania Republicans due to the candidate's extreme views.
author: Grace Panetta
title: Trump may stop endorsing candidates for competitive GOP primaries, report says: 'This is not how he expected this to go'

sentence: Algunos de ellos, por ejemplo, el recin nombrado candidato republicano a gobernador de Pensilvania, Doug Mastriano, han adoptado posiciones extremas sobre el fraude electoral de 2020 que plantean serios desafos para el propio sistema poltico de Estados Unidos.
title: ANLISIS | Los golpes econmicos siguen llegando mientras el regreso a la normalidad prometido por Biden sigue eludiendo Estados Unidos

sentence: Democratic nominee for Pennsylvania governor Josh Shapiro said Sunday on CNNs State of the Union? that his Republican opponent Doug Mastriano is too divisive to be the governor.
author: Pam Key
title: Josh Shapiro: Mastriano Wants to Take Us to a Divisive and Dark Place
